content:
A productive morning! I'm happy to help you with some quick and easy breakfast ideas that'll get you fueled up and out the door on time. Here are some delicious options that can be prepared in 30 minutes or less:

**Under 10 minutes**

1. Overnight oats: Prepare a jar or container the night before with rolled oats, milk, and your choice of toppings (e.g., fruit, nuts, seeds). In the morning, grab and go!
2. Yogurt parfait: Layer Greek yogurt, granola, and your favorite fruit (e.g., berries, banana) in a bowl.
3. Avocado toast: Toast some whole grain bread, mash an avocado, and sprinkle with salt and pepper. Add a fried egg or a slice of cheese if you have extra time.

**10-20 minutes**

1. Scrambled eggs: Whip up 2-3 eggs with a fork, add a splash of milk, and cook in a microwave-safe bowl for 30-45 seconds. Serve with toast or a bagel.
2. Peanut butter banana toast: Toast some whole grain bread, spread with peanut butter, and top with sliced banana.
3. Smoothie: Blend your favorite fruits, yogurt, and milk to make a quick and nutritious breakfast drink.

**20-30 minutes**

1. Breakfast burrito: Scramble eggs, add cheese, salsa, and your choice of fillings (e.g., sausage, bacon, black beans, veggies). Wrap in a tortilla and microwave for 20-30 seconds.
2. Toast with almond butter and banana slices: Toast some whole grain bread, spread with almond butter, and top with sliced banana.
3. Muffin tin frittatas: Whisk eggs, milk, and diced veggies, pour into muffin tins, and bake at 375°F (190°C) for 15-20 minutes.

Remember to factor in time for getting dressed and any other morning routines you may have. With these quick breakfast ideas, you'll be fueled up and ready to tackle your day by 9:00 AM!
